fn.p: Author contributions: Meng X and Li HB contributed to the conception and design of the study; Meng X, Tang GY, Liu PH, and Liu Q performed the experiments and acquired data; Meng X and Liu PH drafted the article; Tang GY, Zhao CJ, and Liu Q made critical revisions; all authors approved the final version of the article.

Corresponding author: Xiao Meng, PhD, Lecturer, Department of Nutrition, School of Public Health, Sun Yat-Sen University, No. 74 Zhongshan Road 2, Yuexiu District, Guangzhou 510080, Guangdong Province, China. mengx7@mail2.sysu.edu.cn
